mapper.select: SELECT sys_role.id, sys_role.available, sys_role.description, sys_role.role, sys_permission.`name`, sys_permission.permission, sys_permission.url FROM (sys_permission, sys_role) RIGHT JOIN sys_role_permission ON sys_permission.id = sys_role_permission.permission_id AND sys_role_permission.role_id = sys_role.id WHERE sys_role.id=#{roleId}
